H0.text: Which grape is used to produce top-quality Burgundy red wines. Pinot Noir

H1.text: Which grape is used to produce top-quality Burgundy red wines. Gamay

H2.text: Which grape is used to produce top-quality Burgundy red wines. Syrah

H3.text: Which grape is used to produce top-quality Burgundy red wines. Rouci

A4.text: The most famous wines produced here, and those commonly referred to as 'Burgundies', are dry red wines made from pinot noir grapes

A5.text: The duke declared the 'vile and disloyal Gamay'... unfit for human consumption and banned the use of organic fertilizer
